data.name: Fedi Blog
data.description: A modern blogging platform built with Next.js and Strapi, featuring a clean and responsive design. The platform supports markdown content, image optimization, and dynamic routing for a seamless user experience.

data.name: Portfolio
data.description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects and skills. Built with React and styled with Tailwind CSS, featuring a responsive layout, dark mode support, and smooth animations.

data.name: Pawhaven
data.description: A simple landing page for a fictional pet rescue organization, designed to showcase adoptable pets and provide information about the rescue's mission. Built with React and styled with Tailwind CSS for a modern, responsive experience.

data.name: stylecrafter
data.description: A modern blogging platform built with Next.js and Strapi, featuring a clean and responsive design. The platform supports markdown content, image optimization, and dynamic routing for a seamless user experience.
